text: Hamono qaʙul mekunand da'vati Islomro ej Pajomʙar onhoe, ki mesunavand, ammo kofiron dar qaʙuli haq dar guruhi murdagonand, zero hajoti haqiqi dar islom ast. Va murdagonro Alloh az qaʙrhojason zinda megardonad. Sipas hama dar ruzi qijomat ʙa nazdi U ʙozgardonida mesavand, to ki hisoʙu kitoʙ karda savand
